DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Immunosuppressive Therapy Administered Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response indicating whether a patient has received prior treatment with immunosuppressive agents.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to prior immunosuppressive therapy (therapy used to decrease the body's immune response, such as drugs given to prevent transplant rejection) received by the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: deliberate suppression of immune system function for experimental or therapeutic purposes.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: SWOG CRF:Southwest Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does patient require chronic
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require chronic treatment with corticosteroids or other immunosuppressive agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving chronic corticosteroid administration prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with systemic immunosuppressive medications including, but not limited to, prednisone, cyclophosphamide, azathioprine, methotrexate, thalidomide, and anti-tumor necrosis factor [anti-TNF] agents within 2 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving any immunosuppressive therapy while on study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently using immunosuppressive medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient on any other immunosuppressive medications (e.g. cyclosporine, tacrolimus)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently taking or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before the first dose of MEDI4736 (durvalumab) except as noted in section 3.2.7?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received immunosuppressive medication less than or equal to 7 days prior to registration, EXCEPT for the following: Intranasal, inhaled, topical steroids, or local steroid injection (e.g., intra-articular injection), or systemic corticosteroids at physiologic doses less than or equal to 10 mg/day of prednisone or equivalent?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received immunosuppressive medication (except as noted in the protocol)  less than or equal to 7 days prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient been off any systemic corticosteroids for the treatment of brain metastases for at least 14 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has received treatment with systemic immunosuppressive medications (including, but not limited to, prednisone, cyclophosphamide, azathioprine, methotrexate, thalidomide, and anti-tumor necrosis factor [anti-TNF] agents), was last dose a minimum of 2 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 11
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with systemic immunosuppressive medications (including, but not limited to, prednisone (greater than 10mg), cyclophosphamide, tacrolimus, sirolimus, azathioprine, methotrexate, thalidomide, and anti-tumor necrosis factor [anti-TNF] agents) within 2 weeks prior to Randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 10
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have at least 7 days elapsed since the last pharmacologic dose of systemic steroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 12
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require ongoing treatment with other immunosuppressive agent including, but not limited to, methotrexate, azathioprine, anti-TNF agents, etc. with the exception of steroids (see sections 6.4 and 7.1)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 13
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require current or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before the first dose of durvalumab?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient had prior treatment with systemic immunosuppressive medication?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 14
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received treatment with systemic immunosuppressive medications including, but not limited to, prednisone, cyclophosphamide, azathioprine, methotrexate, thalidomide, and anti-tumor necrosis factor [anti-TNF] agents within 2 weeks prior to Cycle 1, Day 1 or anticipation of need for systemic immunosuppressive medication during study treatment, except as noted in the protocol?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 15
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have at least 7 days elapsed since the last pharmacologic dose of systemic corticosteroids?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient require systemic corticosteroids or other immunosuppressive therapy as defined in the protocol and not meeting any exceptions?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 16
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently taking or prior use of immunosuppressive medication within 14 days before the first dose of MEDI4736 (durvalumab) except as noted in section 3.2.3?

DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2023.8.2 AQT added per ticket request CADSR0002682. ak
